howItWorks.title:
From Setup to Story
In Minutes, Not Hours

step1.title: You Purchase & Invite
step1.description: Choose a family package. Send a simple link to your parent via text or email. No apps to download, no passwords to remember.

step2.title: They Record Effortlessly
step2.description: One tap to accept. A warm AI voice asks a question. They press record, share their story, attach a photo if they want, and hit send.

step3.title: You Listen & Connect
step3.description: Get notified. Listen to their voice. Read the transcript. Leave a comment. Ask a follow-up question that sparks the next memory.

step4.title: Stories Compound Forever
step4.description: Over weeks and months, your family archive grows. Siblings join. Themes emerge. A lifetime of wisdom becomes navigable, searchable, and eternal.
